title: Can you report people for advertising to elo boost?
body: I have this guy that added me ("Gurid") and he often spams me with advertisements of carrying me out of elo hell. Is this reportable?

replies.body: It is reportable. If not because of the actual act of elo boosting, then for the fact that it's a bot and it's using chat services to spam advertisements. Submit a support ticket about it and the red will advise you on what to do.
